Problem Description and Immediate Action.Q: 1) What is the problem/event that occurred ?
2) For this problem/event which is the affected product / products?
3) For this problem/event which is the affected product batch number / batch numbers?
4) For this problem/event which is the affected equipments (specify equipment codes as well) ?
5) For this problem/event at what time/date was the problem/event discovered ?
6) For this problem/event at what time/date has the problem/event occurred?
7) For this problem/event in which department was the problem/event discovered ?
8) For this problem/event in which department has the problem/event occurred?
10) The event/problem is a deviation from what ? ( An existing procedure, specifications,etc. ) Provide details of the procedure, specifications, etc.
12) Who was involved in the incident/problem ?
13) Where in the process is the problem detected ?
14) Where else could the incident occur but did not ?
15) What immediate action/interim control was taken after the event was discovered?
16) Who approved the immediate action/interim control that was taken ?
17) Who undertook the immediate actions/interim controls that were implemented following this event ?
18) When did immediate actions/interim control take place ?
19) How will the immediate actions taken contain the spread of the event ?

Initial Impact Assessment.Q: 1) Has the deviation been raised within 24 hours of discovering the event ?
2) If the deviation was not raised within 24 hours of finding the problem/event, has any justification been provided ?
3) How often has this event occurred in the past ?
5) Is there any impact on patient safety ? Please provide justification.
6) Is there any impact on product quality ? Please provide justification.
7) Is this event related to Data Integrity ?
8) Is there any impact to the global procedure of the company ?
9) Is any customer quality agreement impacted by this deviation ?

Investigation/Root Cause Analysis.Q: 1) Who are the cross-functional team members who performed the investigation (Include Name and Function) ?
2) What is the deviation scope ? ( Specify what is included in the scope of the deviation and what is not and why ? Consider and specify Products/Batches/Equipment/Parameters/Documents/People/Time).
3) As a part of investigation plan - Which documents would/have been reviewed (Batch Records, SOPs, Work Instructions, reports, etc. )?
4) As a part of investigation plan - Which QMS records would/have been reviewed (CAPA, Change Controls, Deviations, Quality Agreements) ?
5) As a part of investigation plan - Will any additional testing be performed or has been performed ?
6) As a part of investigation plan - Gemba performed/Comment on other data gathering techniques ?
7) As a part of investigation plan - Comment on the data analysis performed.
8) What are the investigation tools that are used for the investigation ?
9) Was a historical review of similar events performed ?
10) Has any process change occurred in the process in the last 12 months ?

Man-power.Q: 1) Who were the employees that were interviewed for this investigation (Please include their function as well) ?
2) Were the employees that were involved in the event current with the training ?
3) Is man-power a possible root cause for this event ?
4) What is the justification for concluding man-power is a possible root cause ?
5) If man-power is not a possible root cause for this event what is the justification ?

Material.Q: 1) Was the material/materials labeled correctly, tested and identified correctly ?
3) Is the certificate of analysis of the material/materials used correct ?
4) Was the material/materials damaged when received ?
5) Was the material/materials stored according to storage condition ?
6) Was the material/materials that was used within the expiration time ?
8) Is material a possible root cause for this event ?
9) If material is not a possible root cause for this event what is the justification ?

Method/Process.Q: 1) Which procedures / standard operating procedures (SOPs) are applicable/relevant to this event ?
2) Were there any issues/gaps identified in these procedures ?
3) Were there any calculations involved in this quality event ?
4) If calculations were involved have they been verified ?
5) Is Method/Process a possible root cause ? Please provide justification.
6) If method/process is not a possible root cause for this event what is the justification ?

Equipment.Q: 1) Were any equipment/instrument involved in this event ? Itemize the answer
2) Were the equipment/instrument involved in the event setup correctly ? Itemize the answer.
3) Were the parameters in the equipment/instrument setup correctly ? Itemize the answer.
4) Did any equipment/instrument malfunction during the process ? Itemize the answer.
5) Were the equipment/instrument operating within the validated ranges ? Itemize the answer.
6) Were the equipment/instrument within calibration due date ? Itemize the answer.
7) Were the equipment/instrument clean ? Itemize the answer.
8) Is Equipment/instrument a possible root cause ? Please provide justification.
9) If equipment is not a possible root cause for this event what is the justification ?

Environment.Q: 1) Did any natural disaster occur that could have caused this event ?
2) Was there any temperature excursion in the area involved in the process ?
3) Was there any humidity excursion in the area involved in the process ?
4) Is Environment a possible root cause ? Please provide justification.
5) If Environment is not a possible root cause for this event what is the justification ?

Root Cause.Q: 1) What are the possible root cause or root causes for this event ?

Corrective Action.Q: 1) What corrective action is proposed for the root cause identified for the event ? Itemize the answer(If there are more than 1 corrective actions). Include completion date.

Preventive Action.Q: 1) What is/are the preventive action proposed for the root cause identified for the event ? Itemize the answer (If there are more than 1 preventive actions). Include completion date.
2) Any interim controls proposed for the root cause identified for the event ? Include completion date.

Detailed Impact Assessment (Final).Q: 1) What is the impact assessment on product quality ? (Include product name, batch number) Please provide detailed justification.
2) What is the impact of this event on a quality system (Include procedure / standard operating procedures) ? Please provide detailed justification
3) What is the impact of this event on a quality sub-system ?
4) Are any previously manufactured batches impacted by this event ? (Include product name, batch number) Please provide justification.
5) Are any other related activities previously executed impacted by this event ?
6) Are any activities planned in the future impacted by this event ? If yes, what is the CAPA for the same ?
